Lin, X., et al., Generation of stable mutants and targeted gene deletion strains in Cryptococcus neoformans through electroporation. Med Mycol, 2015. 53(3): p. 225-234.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":153,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vrar","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80h2o","text":"2. Fan, Y. and X. Lin, Multiple applications of a transient CRISPR-Cas9 coupled with electroporation (TRACE) system in the Cryptococcus neoformans species complex. Genetics, 2018. 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"ff0j3","text":"PCR amplification of CAS9, sgRNA, your construct. 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"44th5","text":"CAS9: Use plasmid pXL1-CAS9-HYG as template with primers CAS9-F and CAS9-R. (6985 bp)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"915de","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"15k09","text":"sgRNA: U6P and sgRNA scaffold 
 ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"diqs1","text":"U6pPromoteris PCR amplified using serotype Dgenomic DNA astemplate with primers U6P-F and GOI-sgRNA-R. ~295 bp ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c4v7a","text":"SgRNA scaffold is PCR amplified using pYF515 astemplate with primers GOI- sgRNA-F and sgRNA-R. ~108 bp ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cevjt","text":"sgRNA construct is PCR amplified using above two PCR product sastemplate with primers U6P-F and sgRNA-R. ~383 bp 
 
 
 
 ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c95lc","text":"Mix  your construct DNA, 100 ng sgRNA, and 170 ng CAS9 in an Eppendorf tube. 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1nahr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","guid":"F000F300E0FA11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"E3E08C70E0FA11E8B702517507F16E11","unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6b1r0","text":"Vacuum dry the DNA and elute in DNAse/RNAse free water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"85veu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"dg062","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cslvv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"FF758DA0E0FA11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"FB0673B0E0FA11E8B702517507F16E11","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d6qr2","text":"Notes: use the combination of 2 μg construct DNA, 1 μg CAS9 DNA, and 700 ng sgRNA can increase the transformation efficiency, but low dose is sufficient to obtain transformants.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"825it","text":"Inoculate recipient strain in   YPD liquid medium, culture overnight at   with shaking at 250 rpm.
 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"20pv2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3orh1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"1BC9E730E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"107227D0E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"20D3E190E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"107227D0E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","temperature":"30","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bbjb","text":"Collect cells by centrifugation at 3200g for at  .
 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fou1h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6mu87","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"5DD23330E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"519480A0E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11"}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"61F21BB0E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"519480A0E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4fsc5","text":" Wash cells  with ice-cold water (EB Buffer instead of water in 2015 paper).  (wash 1/2)
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8ede","text":"Suspend cells in  ice-cold EB buffer (10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 1mM MgCl2, 270 mM Sucrose) with 1mM DTT.
 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":70,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2ur3f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"BA616BC0E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"B4344E20E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8pdsj","text":" Incubate the cells on ice for an hour ( ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7ideh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fmnqj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"djkh5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"jn0c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"CE23B5A0E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"C37C3370E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2isn8","text":"(30  to  60  mins  in  2015  paper)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b165f","text":"(Optional) Wash cells with  ice-cold EB buffer once (2015 paper).
 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1nsal","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"D9B2D8B0E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"D0910C20E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"801k0","text":"Collect the cells by centrifugation and resuspend in  EB buffer.
 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2j5ta","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","guid":"E6EEE870E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"DCD48B10E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ve61","text":"Mix   cells with   DNA mix from step 2  in a pre-cooled 2 mm gap electroporation cuvette.
 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2n7tm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2rnev","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"91i3k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"45","guid":"F221E1C0E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"E966C640E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"F62122E0E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"E966C640E0FB11E8B702517507F16E11","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6aets","text":"Transform the DNA by electroporation using the BioRad gene pulser with settings of 0.45 kV, 125 μF, 600 Ω. (If using an Eppendorf multiporator, use the bacterial mode with V=2 kV with τ optimized for 5 ms)
 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7tp9b","text":"Suspend electroporated cells in  of YPD medium and culture at   for   ( in 2015 paper) before plating onto the appropriate selective agar medium. 
 
 
 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":68,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"b15jf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7j6ep","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"949hj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"259pj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","guid":"2D7F2D90E0FC11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"24A1E410E0FC11E8B702517507F16E11","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"320B1E50E0FC11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"24A1E410E0FC11E8B702517507F16E11","temperature":"30","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"39596360E0FC11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"24A1E410E0FC11E8B702517507F16E11"}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":5400,"guid":"41C77050E0FC11E8B702517507F16E11","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"24A1E410E0FC11E8B702517507F16E11"}}}}
